title: ISic000092. Honours for Caius Maesius
body:
Facsimile Images

C(aio) ((ivy-leaf)) Maesio ((ivy-leaf)) Aquillio
Fabio Titiano ((·)) c(larissimo) ((·)) v(iro) ((·)) co(n)s(uli) ((ivy-leaf))
optimo civi ac patrono bene me-
renti ((ivy-leaf)) ( vac. 3)ordo et populus splen-
5[d]idissimae col(oniae) Aug(ustae) Himereorum
[The]rmit(anorum) ((ivy-leaf)) ( vac. 1)pecunia sua posuit

Apparatus criticus

Text from autopsy

English translation

To Gaius Maesius Aquillius Fabius Titianus, a most illustrious man (i.e. of senatorial class), consul, an excellent citizen and patron, well-deserving - the council and people of the most splendid Colonia Augusta Himereorum Thermitanorum erected this at their own expense.

commentary
